revised_title: A Revision and Description of New Hyracotherium Specimens Found in England
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Mammal Evolution
tldr: The author revisits the genus Hyracotherium, also known as Eohippus, and provides a detailed description of new specimens found in England. They compare the type specimens and discuss the characteristics of the molars and premolars, contributing to the understanding of the evolution of early mammals.
